text: Actress Marlee Matlin met with Tyler Henry to see if he knew how she lost her hearing on Wednesday's new episode of E!'s ` ` Hollywood Medium.'' In TooFab's exclusive sneak peek, Henry interprets messages that lead him to believe Matlin's deafness is a result of a childhood illness. ` ` When I'm looking at your deafness, I'm actually looking at a little bit more of a gradual process,'' he says. ` ` It's odd. But there was also, interestingly, a susceptibility when you were a child.''
